# nats Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "nats" {
  url = "http://locahost:4222"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `url` (String) nats url (default: 'nats://localhost:4222')
